text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Next week is the long-awaited<n>tryouts! For newbie trainers
like me,<n>this event is our first step on our<n>journeys to
bringing out the best in<n>every racer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
At the tryouts, each runner does their<n>best to show off their
abilities to<n>prospective trainers, who then scout<n>them. It's
an important event for both<n>parties.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While there's still time between now<n>and then, my
nerves—and<n>excitement—are getting the better of<n>me. I
decide to take a stroll to calm<n>down.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I walk through a park near the<n>academy, I hear the
sound of children<n>playing. I turn towards the source of<n>the
noise, only to see an Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Aw yeah! Time's up! Looks like I win<n>again!

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: Y-you're too fast, Tama!

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text:
How're we s'posed to tag you when<n>you're the fastest
runner?! You're not<n>playing faaair!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Nyahaha! Life isn't fair, squirts!<n>'Sides, ya wouldn't want
me goin'<n>easy on ya just 'cause you're<n>smaller than
me, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I know! Show us how fast you<n>can run again, and we'll
forgive you!

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah! I wanna see you go<n>ZOOM! Do it! Do it!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
What, again? Well, if it'll make you<n>happy, I don't see why
not. Back it up,<n>everybody! Don't want any of ya<n>gettin'
hurt!

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Okaaay!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
All right, ready, kiddos? I'm only<n>doin' this once, so keep
those<n>peepers peeled!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hup!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Uraaagh! Whaddaya think of dis?!

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: Whoooaaa! That's so fast!

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Yeah, the speediest speedster ever!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Those kids aren't kidding. She's a<n>powerful runner, but
there's also this<n>playfulness to it. And her acceleration!<n>
It's near instantaneous—almost like...<n>like...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Did you just say—wait, who're you?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I suddenly feel everyone's eyes on<n>me. The
embarrassment sets in as I<n>realize I just said that out loud.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for what? You wouldn't be<n>apologizin' if you didn't
do anythin'<n>wrong. And what're ya starin' at<n>anyway?
Get behind me, kids!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before this misunderstanding gets<n>out of hand, I quickly
stammer out an<n>explanation.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
So you can't even take a walk<n>without daydreamin' about
racin'?<n>Geez, you must love your job a<n>helluva lot.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Talk about coincidences though.<n>You're a rookie trainer,
right? Well,<n>I'm workin' towards my racin' debut<n>myself.

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: Tamaaa! Hurry up! We wanna play<n>hide and seek next!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah, I'll be right with ya!<n>Phew... Where do kids get
all that<n>energy from?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, the name's Tamamo Cross.<n>Since we're both
rookies, I get the<n>feelin' we'll be seein' a lotta each<n>
other. See ya 'round!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross... Once she makes her<n>debut, how will her
running evolve? I<n>leave the park with something new to<n>
look forward to.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: One week later...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day of the tryouts is here. I scan<n>the crowd of runners
preparing to<n>race, when I catch sight of one I<n>recognize...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
It's fine... You've got this in the bag...<n>Just run as fast as
you can... get<n>ahead of everybody... and win!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Losin' here isn't an option. Not now...<n>not ever!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her demeanor seems completely<n>different from the day we
met in the<n>park. I watch as she takes her<n>position...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huff! Huff! Huff! I gotta win dis! Igotta! I gotta win no matter what!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross is losing steam!<n>She's falling behind the
leading<n>racers!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As she slips back, so too does her<n>chance to place high in
the race...<n>Confusion furrows my brow. What<n>happened to
the runner I saw at the<n>park?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross, huh? She showed a<n>lot of promise in the
beginning of the<n>race, but she was way too hasty. She<n>
failed to maintain the very pace she<n>set.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, she's clearly got the drive, but<n>with that teenie body,
there's no way<n>she can keep up with the competition<n>in
the final stretch.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Dammit... Dammit, dammit,dammit! The hell's wrong withme...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, Tamamo Cross? You<n>must be exhausted after
that run, but<n>do you have a moment?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huh? Y-yeah, sure...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
I'll cut straight to the point—I want to<n>scout you. You might
be rough around<n>the edges at the moment, but a bit of<n>
refining will surely have you shining<n>in no time.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: R-really?!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Really. With me as your trainer, you<n>might make it to the
graded races. In<n>fact, you might even place in the top<n>five.
What do you say?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Whaddaya mean, "top five"? Give it<n>to me straight—you
think I can ace a<n>G1 race or not?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Well... I can't promise anything. If you<n>work hard, you might
have a chance,<n>but—

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Then get outta my face!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I'm lookin' to WIN! No ifs, ands, orbuts about it! Top five's nowherenear good 'nuff!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
But your punk ass thinks that's all I<n>got? Well, screw your
stupid offer!<n>Take your wishy-washy ways and<n>find some
other chump!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text: ...Hmph. What an unruly racer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The other trainers stand by as<n>Tamamo Cross storms off,<n>
unimpressed by her temper. But that<n>same temper shows
how badly she<n>wants to win...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Dammit... dammit! What a low-down<n>jerk! Treatin' me like a
loser... but<n>why wouldn't he? That's how I ran<n>today...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: You're... that trainer from the park...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
You're a rookie trainer, aren't ya?<n>What makes ya think a
no-name<n>trainer like you has what it takes?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Ya really think ya can take me on,<n>train me up, and turn me
into a<n>champ?! I'm not just talkin' G1<n>here—I mean all of
Japan!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The rage Tamamo Cross feels boils<n>to the surface, and she
lashes out. I<n>desperately search for words to quell<n>the fire,
but to no avail.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Drop the act. You're nothing special,<n>and neither am I...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross takes off, leaving me<n>with only my regret as
company...
